original: Björkbom, Per Valfrid August, major, Linköping, f. 3/5/83 i Piteå lands-förs., Norrb. k, av prov :läk. Ture Hjalmar B. o. Hilma Hammarberg. G. 1. 10 m. Elisabeth Eurén; 2. 23 m. Edith Nilsson. Barn: Kersti f. 12, Bo 24, Kjelil 25, Anna-Martha 29. — Mogiex. i Umeå 02, off :ex. 04, gymn :dir :ex. 12. Studires. t. Tyskl. 07 o. Frankr. 08. Oiff. på stat v. 1. 19 04-33, major i armén 32, befälli. f. Bodens ro n:r 73 33-42, bitr. mobioff. v. T. 1 42-46, pens. SS. major i I. 19 res. 46. Ordf. i pens:ndn i Boden 23-42, kyrkovärd samt led. av kyrkofullm. o. kyrkoråd i Överluleå. RSO.
translated: Björkbom, Per Valfrid August, Major, Linköping, born on May 3rd, 1883 in Piteå lands parish, Norrbotten county, son of district medical officer Ture Hjalmar B. and Hilma Hammarberg. He was married twice, first on October 1st to Elisabeth Eurén and then on February 23rd to Edith Nilsson. He had four children: Kersti born in 1912, Bo born in 1924, Kjelil born in 1925 and Anna-Martha born in 1929. He passed the Mogiexaminationen in Umeå in 1902, was commissioned officer in 1904 and passed the gymnastics teacher examination in 1912. He studied in Germany in 1907 and France in 1908. He was a public servant from 1904-1933 and became a Major in the army in 1932. He was the commanding officer of Boden's coastal artillery regiment no. 73 from 1933-1942, assistant mobilization officer at the Swedish First Army 1942-1946 and retired as a SS. Major in the Swedish Air Force in 1946. He was the chairman of the pension board in Boden from 1923-1942, church warden and member of the church council and church board in Överluleå. He was awarded the Royal Order of the Sword.

memberOf.name: Överluleå
memberOf.jobTitle: Church Warden and Member of the Church Council and Church Board
